attributes.action: Give the NHS a pay rise for risking their lives
attributes.additional_details: Because the NHS is risking their lives
attributes.background: Give the NHS a pay rise

rejection.details:
Award all Nursing Staff in the NHS a pay rise of 10% backdated to 1 April 2020 - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316307

Give government workers a fair pay rise - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328754

Pay rise for NHS and care staff - https://petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/313488
